short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attack on Titan Chibi Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Attack on Titan Chibi background. AoT Chibi theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Attack on Titan Chibi wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your Attack on Titan Chibi background by randomizing it or marking it as a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down your tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for rapid access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to More Themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. One-click navigation to play games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Attack on Titan Chibi new tab.
